brainly_data.question: What figure of speech is used in thus line from Walt Whitman's poem "I Hear America Singing"?
brainly_data.subject: English

all_answers.question: What figure of speech is used in thus line from Walt Whitman's poem "I Hear America Singing"?
all_answers.subject: English
all_answers.text: "I Hear America Singing" is a personification becuase its giving a non-living object a human-like thing.
